channel.title: Comments on: What Ever Happened To The Double Feature?

item.title: By: John Wallach
item.dc:creator: John Wallach
item.description: I just woke up to the fact of the quiet disappearance of the double feature, a standard movie theater practice of my childhood. When I grew up in New York City, only the theaters in the Broadway area that specialized premiering new movies would only show that one film. All neighborhood theaters were double feature theaters. Now it's even hard to imagine sitting through two films back to back.
item.content:encoded: I just woke up to the fact of the quiet disappearance of the double feature, a standard movie theater practice of my childhood. When I grew up in New York City, only the theaters in the Broadway area that specialized premiering new movies would only show that one film. All neighborhood theaters were double feature theaters. Now it’s even hard to imagine sitting through two films back to back.
